name: Cosmo Runner (Alpha)
description:
Cosmo Runner is a simple casual, Vertical Runner game that the only objective of the player is to reach the highest score avoiding the meteors and traps.

It was made in unity and the objective is to release the game for android.

This is my first project and i'm trying to start a carrer in the game development. I know that this game is very much simple, but i release this alpha version to try raise some funds to continue this. The project is done but i'm having some problems to build for the android platforms (when i do the official release of this project i will leave the link of the playstore page here too). So if anyone wants to help me, please buy this version, Any feedback is welcome too, i will be really gratefull ^^

Controls:

- W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys to move the ship.

- Mouse to click the Buttons

*this release is basically an alpha version so some features are not equal or not works in the same way of the unity project.
